result.reason: Add Windows Key option to VNC Send Special Keys menu using X11 keysym injection (XK_Super_L).
result.approach: Add `WindowsKey` to `SpecialKeys` enum. In `SendSpecialKeys`, use reflection to invoke `WriteKeyboardEvent` on the underlying `VncClient` with `XK_Super_L` keysym (simulating press and release). Update UI to include the new menu option.
